Shepherds Pie

Shepherd's pie is a savory British casserole made with minced meat, vegetables, and mashed potatoes.

Ingredients

  • - 500 Grams Ground Beef
  • - 1 Piece White Onion (Minced)
  • - 2 Cloves Garlic
  • - 1 Stalk Celery
  • - 2 Tablespoons Flour (All Purpose)
  • - 1 Teaspoon Dried Rosemary
  • - 1 Teaspoon Dried Thyme
  • - 2 Tablespoon Tomato Paste
  • - 1 Beef Stock
  • - 2 Tablespoon Worcestershire Sauce
  • - 1 Teaspoon Chili Flakes
  • - 1 Cup Corn and Carrots
  • - Salt and Pepper
  • - 5 Pcs Potato (Peeled)
  • - 2 Tablespoon Parmesean Cheese
  • - 4 Pieces Egg Yolks
  • - 1 Tablespoon Chopped Parsely

About Recipedia

cooking! Our website is designed to help extend knowledge about cooking and provide valuable
resources for those who wish to learn more about the culinary arts.
